import './navbar.css'; import {IconContext} from 'react-icons' import { BsBell , BsBellFill, BsChatDots , BsChatDotsFill , BsCalendar , BsCalendarFill , BsThreeDots} from "react-icons/bs"; import { HiOutlineUserGroup , HiUserGroup , HiOutlineShoppingBag , HiShoppingBag } from "react-icons/hi"; import { IoCallOutline , IoCallSharp , IoHelpCircleSharp , IoHelpCircleOutline } from "react-icons/io5"; import { AiOutlineFile , AiFillFile , AiOutlineAppstoreAdd } from "react-icons/ai"; function Navbar(){ function NavHandler(){ const items=document.querySelectorAll(".NavItem-wrapper") items.forEach(item =>{ item.addEventListener("mouseover",() => { const icons=item.childNodes[0] icons.childNodes[0].classList.add('passive'); icons.childNodes[1].classList.add('active'); }) }) } function NavOut(){ const items=document.querySelectorAll(".NavItem-wrapper") items.forEach(item =>{ item.addEventListener("mouseover",() => { const icons=item.childNodes[0]; }) }) } return(
{/*

{/*
{}
*/}
); } export default Navbar;
